headline: Apple or Super Micro Computer: Bernstein Selects the Top AI Hardware Stock to Buy
summary: ChatGPT’s introduction of generative AI sparked an AI boom that continues to reverberate through the markets today. One thing is already clear: much of the conversation around AI centers on its capabilities, and those capabilities are nearly endless. AI has the potential to bring greater efficiency to a wide range of fields, likely extending to far more applications than we can currently imagine.
